casebody.data:
Walter W. McVAY v. AMERICAN RADIATOR & STANDARD SANITARY CORPORATION, Appellant. No. 7678. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. March 20, 1941. Sidney J. Watts, of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant. John H. Sorg, of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, MARIS, and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the district court, 1 F.R.D. 677, is affirmed.
